医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能揭示了治疗选择有限的癌症的新药物靶点威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员利用人工智能，根据患者肿瘤的调控网络图谱来识别药物靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/AI-reveals-new-drug-targets-for-cancers-with-limited-treatment-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/AI-reveals-new-drug-targets-for-cancers-with-limited-treatment-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7239a119-00c5-417e-8401-c35fcfc226b6 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 22:26:21 -0400 AI reveals new drug targets for cancers with limited treatment options
利用噬菌体作为耐药细菌的靶向治疗随着抗生素耐药性对我们的健康构成越来越严重的威胁，科学界和医学界正在寻找新的药物来对抗感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Harnessing-bacteriophages-as-targeted-treatments-for-drug-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Harnessing-bacteriophages-as-targeted-treatments-for-drug-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=267aaf2d-8507-4965-9de0-53752c3c6f54 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 21:49:49 -0400 Harnessing bacteriophages as targeted treatments for drug-resistant bacteria
研究人员寻求通过智能生物计算彻底改变神经疾病治疗借助美国国家科学基金会新提供的资金，加州大学欧文分校和南加州大学凯克医学院的研究人员将寻求通过智能生物计算彻底改变神经系统疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Researchers-seek-to-revolutionize-neurological-disease-treatment-through-intelligent-biocomputing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Researchers-seek-to-revolutionize-neurological-disease-treatment-through-intelligent-biocomputing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86dd3314-42a5-4e57-8668-701c7d5280ed Thu, 05 Sep 2024 21:30:34 -0400 Researchers seek to revolutionize neurological disease treatment through intelligent biocomputing
低碳水化合物饮食超出营养需求，并通过改善关键饮食比例促进心脏健康研究表明，精心设计的低碳水化合物饮食可以满足或超过必需营养需求，同时促进有利的脂肪酸和钠钾比例，这可能会降低慢性疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Low-carb-diets-exceed- Nutrition-needs-and-promote-heart-health-by-improving-key-dietary-ratios.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Low-carb-diets-exceed- Nutrition-needs-and-promote-heart-health-by-improving-key-dietary-ratios.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fdf2158-e038-4f77-ac23-f3a8c6a76615 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 18:46:00 -0400 Low-carb diets exceed nutrient needs and promote heart health by improving key dietary ratios
神经胶质瘤中发现的混合神经元-胶质细胞可能影响肿瘤生长贝勒医学院和德克萨斯儿童医院简和丹邓肯神经学研究所的研究人员在人脑中发现了一种新的细胞类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Hybrid-neuron-glia-cells-found-in-glioma-may-impact-tumor-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Hybrid-neuron-glia-cells-found-in-glioma-may-impact-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162578a0-7036-4779-8a42-2068b0c47ec7 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 15:46:53 -0400 Hybrid neuron-glia cells found in glioma may impact tumor growth
蚊子唾液如何帮助开发虫媒病毒疾病的疗法您可能会猜想从蚊子身上提取唾液是很困难的。你是对的。然而，由于蚊子通过唾液传播疾病，因此采样和研究至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/How-mosquito-spit-could-help-develop-therapies-for-arboviral-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/How-mosquito-spit-could-help-develop-therapies-for-arboviral-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=426d4d60-866e-47d1-87b6-c290409a05f8 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 15:38:06 -0400 How mosquito spit could help develop therapies for arboviral diseases
肠道细菌可能影响间皮瘤患者免疫治疗的成功一项癌症研究发现，某些肠道细菌可能会影响患者的免疫系统能否成功对抗间皮瘤（一种侵袭性癌症）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Gut-bacteria-may-influence-immunotherapy-success-in-mesothelioma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Gut-bacteria-may-influence-immunotherapy-success-in-mesothelioma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0798398-ee4d-45bf-b57f-45dc2cc3f95d Thu, 05 Sep 2024 15:25:21 -0400 Gut bacteria may influence immunotherapy success in mesothelioma patients
研究表明牙周细菌与类风湿性关节炎恶化有关牙周病影响牙齿周围的牙龈和组织，是全世界最常见的牙科疾病之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-links-periodontal-bacteria-to-worsening-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-links-periodontal-bacteria-to-worsening-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bc29539-d1b5-4766-8ae8-0388674a6608 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 15:15:50 -0400 Study links periodontal bacteria to worsening rheumatoid arthritis
研究发现早期胰腺癌分期通常不准确根据发表在同行评审期刊《美国医学会杂志》上的一项新的 Cedars-Sinai 癌症研究，早期胰腺癌患者的分期在 80% 的情况下是不准确的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-finds-early-pancreatic-cancer-staging-often-inaccurate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-finds-early-pancreatic-cancer-staging-often-inaccurate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc42210f-9200-4649-91a5-58c3e783fe6d Thu, 05 Sep 2024 15:12:38 -0400 Study finds early pancreatic cancer staging often inaccurate
日本研究人员发现保护心脏细胞免受缺血的关键机制对于影响全世界数百万人的心力衰竭等疾病，了解细胞死亡和存活背后的机制至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Japan-researchers-uncover-key-mechanism-protecting-heart-cells-from-ischemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Japan-researchers-uncover-key-mechanism-protecting-heart-cells-from-ischemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c8d1fbb-5ece-4026-aa1a-f33808c97281 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 15:03:24 -0400 Japanese researchers uncover key mechanism protecting heart cells from ischemia
